text: The United States competed at the 1976 Winter Paralympics in Örnsköldsvik, Sweden. One competitor, Bill Hovanic, competed in four events in two sports. He did not win a medal. The country finished 10th in the medal table. == Alpine skiing == Bill Hovanic competed in the following events: * Men's Alpine Combination II (finished in 5th place) * Men's Giant Slalom II (finished in 6th place) * Men's Slalom II (finished in 8th place) == Cross-country == Bill Hovanic competed in the following event: * Men's Short Distance 5 km II (finished in 13th place) == See also == * United States at the Paralympics * United States at the 1976 Winter Olympics == References == Category:United States at the Paralympics Category:1976 in American sports Category:Nations at the 1976 Winter Paralympics
title: United States at the 1976 Winter Paralympics
